rules.title: Official PvP Rules
rules.intro: These are the official PvP rules used in the 1v1 Multiclass Tournaments, and they should also be taken as a reference for public duels.

multiclass.title: Multiclass 1 v 1 Rules
multiclass.text: -Arena: Blood Swamp. -PvP Plugin: Potions, inventory access, and town portals are disabled. -The map automatically caps maximum resistances to 80% for characters and summons.
